name: Midnight Glass
author: You
css:
:root {\
  --bg-1: hsla(220,15%,20%,0.6);\
  --bg-2: hsla(220,15%,16%,0.6);\
  --bg-3: hsla(220,15%,13%,0.6);\
  --bg-4: hsla(220,15%,10%,0.6);\
  }\
\
body {\
  background: url(https://i.ibb.co/Kz5DB9Ds/IMG-0722.png) center/cover fixed no-repeat !important;\
}\
\
[class*=chat],\
[class*=container],\
[class*=content] {\
  backdrop-filter: blur(12px) !important;\
  background: var(--bg-4) !important;\
}\
\
[class*=sidebar] {\
  background: var(--bg-3) !important;\
  backdrop-filter: blur(12px) !important;\
}\
\
[class*=membersWrap] {\
  background: var(--bg-3) !important;\
  backdrop-filter: blur(12px) !important;\
}\
\
[class*=panels] {\
  background: var(--bg-3) !important;\
  backdrop-filter: blur(12px) !important;\
}
